Posts.Content: I thought that if a cyst kept re filling you could have the cyst sack taken out. Maybe im wrong.
Posts.Title: recurrent cyst a problem?

Posts.Content: My mother had a cyst aspirated yrs ago and it was rusty brown colour. The Doctors amazed her by saying it was old milk from abt 20 years previous when she was breast feeding my brother. She hasnt had any probs since, but you should further check it out, i think ALL fluid should be sent to the lab, whatever colour it is.
Posts.Title: Rusty Brown Aspirated Cyst
